app_descript:
Yee: A Revolutionary Social Connection Hub

Brief: Yee harnesses the power of human connection through advanced video call technology, offering a dynamic social platform that encourages users to engage and form bonds in real time. Aimed at bringing people closer, Yee creates an environment ripe for happiness and social thriving.
